title: AI Video Creator Needed To Start ASAP
job_overview:
We’re looking for someone who knows how to use AI video tools like Veo 3 or Image FX to make short video clips.

You will get clear examples, images, and instructions from us. Your job is to create similar videos and upload them to a folder. That’s it — no extra editing or posting needed.

Your Tasks:
- Create short clips using AI tools (like Veo 3 or Image FX)
- Follow our examples and instructions
- Upload the clips to a shared folder
- Keep the style and quality the same

What You Need:
- Experience with AI video tools (Veo 3, Image FX, or similar)
- Can follow instructions and match examples
- Reliable and deliver on time
- (Bonus) Know MidJourney, Runway, Pika, etc.

Nice to Have:
- Made TikTok-style clips before
- Good eye for video pacing and layout
- Can use VPN if needed
